name: The Endless Locker
description:
This game was made in a private game jam. The specifications were that it must be fit for mobile and must follow the theme "Start with nothing". 

I decided to fulfil these conditions by making the game very simplistic and in portrait to fit the mobile theme. And to fit the start with nothing theme I added an upgrade system so the player... starts with nothing.

I didn't create any of the assets but they were free to use. The sound effects were also sourced online and were free to use. However, I did create everything else from scratch including the music.

I plan to use this as a prototype and keep working on it with the hope of publishing the full game on mobile.

Known Bugs:

- Issue with collisions when starting a run

- Soul absorb upgrade 2 appears to do nothing

- Cannon upgrades appear to do nothing however, they decrease the reload time. This will be made clearer in future updates.

- Speed up curse doesn't always speed the ship up as intended

- Exit button doesn't actually exit the game
